Text: We use Cavender's Salt Free All Purpose Greek Seasoning for almost any food - from fried green tomatoes to cantaloupe.  We no longer are able to find the salt free (blue label) in the stores - only on the internet.  The yellow labeled product in supermarkets contains salt and is far less tasty.  I usually become very thirsty when eating food containing MSG, but this product doesn't have that effect on me.
